Question 1
Which two forms of energy does the Earth receive directly from the Sun?
A. Light and sound
B. Light and thermal
C. Electrical and light
D. Mechanical and thermal
Question 2
Which of the following uses electrical energy to produce light and sound?
A. Lamp
B. Candle
C. Flashlight
D. Television
Question 3
Students in a science class were lighting bulbs by attaching them to batteries with wires. What form of energy were they exploring?
A. Mechanical
B. Electrical
C. Thermal
D. Sound
Question 4
Which form of energy is transmitted by vibrations in the air?
A. Electrical
B. Thermal
C. Sound
D. Heat
Question 5
Water flowing downhill is demonstrating what form of energy?
A. Mechanical
B. Light
C. Electrical
D. Thermal
